snippet: Brad Keselowski routed the field in Richmond, Va., for his fourth win of the season, a victory that gives him the top seed in Nascar’s Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.
abstract: Brad Keselowski routes the field in Richmond, Va, for his fourth win of the season, a victory that gives him the top seed in Nascar’s Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski routed the field in Richmond, Va., for his fourth win of the season, a victory that gives him the top seed in Nascar’s Chase for the Sprint Cup championship.
